body: 请问箭头这个已经加上去了吗

@amei1234 您好，我目前还没有找到获取横轴时间的方式
不知道哪里冲突了，我这也是，单引入版本3就可以，在项目里把版本2换成版本3就出现在这个问题。。请问，你解决了吗

@EyrebaLeo hi，我采取的方式是先获取鼠标的位置，利用的是tooltip的配置项：position。再用
convertFromPixel函数做坐标轴转换（从像素坐标转换至逻辑坐标），转换后得到的第一个参数是个时间戳，用new Date就可以转换成一个时间啦。
@EyrebaLeo hi，有个问题想和您交流下。在上述的截图中，标线不在标记点的中心位置，显示效果上不太符合我们的需求。有什么方法可以让鼠标移动时，只有移到有数据的地方，才显示该点的标记，这样可以保证标线在标记点的中心位置，效果就像标线对标记点有吸附功能似的。。。

If so, could you tell me what type of chart do you need that [calculable](http://echarts.baidu.com/echarts2/doc/option-en.html#calculable) works on?
渲染的时候需要高宽，如果隐藏导致取不到高宽则渲染不出来。如果一定要在隐藏的时候渲染图表，则可在 [echarts.init](http://echarts.baidu.com/api.html#echarts.init) 的时候传入 `width/height`.
同时显示两个『最高气温』，观看者会迷惑的吧？

这么设置：

```js
tooltip: {
    alwaysShowContent: false,
    triggerOn: 'none',
    ...
}
```

然后 tooltip 就全由 dispatchAction 控制而与鼠标无关了。

<http://echarts.baidu.com/build/dist/echarts.js> is echarts 2.x
Try [echarts3.x](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/download.html) please, which will make it work ~

yes I meant calculabe, I'm sorry for my mistake.

如果你不是类目轴的话，用xAxis里面的axisLabel的formatter，每到第二个就加一个\n，应该是可以的

@pissang  您好，treemap有没有分组的表头的设置？

@jarben Looks like they changed the rendering of the category axis. From the changelog:
**[+] category axis has been changed to show all categories by default, in spite of whether there is data in categories. In the past, categories in the end that has no data will not be displayed.**
Thanks @psumstr for pointing out this change. Makes sense, might be useful to have a setting for this so the old behavior can be used as well?

@jarben Yes, I think it would be useful to have both options. The new default is good for time series data where you may want to show all axis labels for say, Month names, but there may be months with no data. I've seen cases where users want to omit those null categories, so having both would be great.

**Update:**

I've kind of moved it to the right, please check [the latest code](https://github.com/suntong/lang/blob/278cdc1107a728e868f62d62e2b05a22e8498094/lang/Charts/ECharts/echarts_HeatMap_2.html)

however, it is at a rather funny-looking place. 
How close it can get to the above standard Seaborn Heatmap? I.e., from the top to the bottom, where the chart is. Not above, nor below. 

**Update 2:**

Is that impossible? If so, I'm OK with that, since I've finally managed to [move it to the center](https://github.com/suntong/lang/blob/master/lang/Charts/ECharts/echarts_HeatMap_2.html)

So question 1 in OP solved. Question 2&3 in OP still holds though (changing the title next...).

Thanks

Further reading have revealed that

> 单个 grid 内最多可以放置上下两个 X 轴，左右两个 Y 轴

from http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#grid

I am OK with that solution, but as long as Location A and Location B are zooming at the same time (联动). Thx.

PS. 

Knowing how to load csv file into a variable is vitally important to me, as most examples in  http://echarts.baidu.com/demo.html are _not_ written in same the way as using `$.get()`. I.e., it seems to me that they need rather major overhaul to make them working with `$.get()` than to deal with local data, populated from csv file.

x轴设置类型为time，Safari 10 遇到类似的问题。

一开始传入数据格式为  ["2016.12.04 13:20:55",732.98]，Safari 中图表无法绘制，显示为空白。但是在 Chrome里可正确绘制图表并显示。

修改数据格式为 "2016-12-04 13:20:55"，Safari 图表可以绘制了，但是显示时间晚了8小时：变成 21:20:55。Chrome显示正常。

修改数据格式为 **"2016/12/04 13:20:55"，问题解决**。

又做了以下几种格式尝试：

"2016-12-04T13:20:55", Safari 和 Chrome 都以UTC时间显示，都晚8小时。
**"12/04/2016 13:20:55", Safari 和 Chrome 都显示正常**。

综上：
为屏蔽浏览器差异，传给x轴的值必须符合JS的date format，才能正确绘制和显示。
remove the key 'stack'

Hi . Thanks for your time. Increasing the height is no help as it increases the canvas height ad graph inside. 

Currently I used a div outside the graph and extend the legends outside the canvas using. The chart api chart.dispatchAction ( which saved d day) for my custom  legends. Since it is in a seperate div, I able to control it. (attached d output)
![index](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3069381/22012597/e51fa576-dcba-11e6-9ea2-3b4121ba844d.png)

Anyways, thanks for the help. And thanks a lot for keeping this graph as open source.
I also meet this issue after upgrading to version 3.4.0.

`$` represents [jQuery](http://jquery.com/). Because using global variable `$` to represent `jQuery` is a well-known habit among JavaScript programmers in the past, we do not make explanation for that. 

About <https://github.com/suntong/lang/blob/master/lang/Charts/ECharts/echarts_LoadCSV_1.html>, I think you need to import `jQuery` for using AJAX, and import [papaparse](http://papaparse.com/) to parse CSV to JavaScript Object. Both `jQuery` and `papaparse` is used in <http://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xrJDKzwZQ>.
Ops, sorry, my bad. Yep, that works.
Yep, that works. Thanks!
Yep, that works. Thanks!

PS. 

Knowing how to load csv file into a variable is vitally important to me, as most examples in  http://echarts.baidu.com/demo.html are _not_ written in same the way as using `$.get()`. I.e., it seems to me that they need rather major overhaul to make them working with `$.get()` than to deal with local data, populated from csv file.

Are you asking for a solution? 
Have you considered adding the following?

- tooltip, 
- or zoom bar, e.g., check out http://echarts.baidu.com/demo.html#mix-zoom-on-value

`parallel series` does not support `tooltip` currently. We have not thought it completely through how to trigger tooltip when mouse on it, considering there are so many "thin" lines. But we have planned to make it clear and add support for tooltip soon.

Oh, thank you, thank you very much!

Two problems:

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/422244/22028611/c6927f3a-dca5-11e6-997a-ba41ce4b5fcb.png)

1. The Continents are not displayed properly. Is the CVS header handled properly? 
1. Why the tallest bars break out of chart and reach to the legend section? 

Moreover, the `metadata.data3` is partially there in the code. Would you be so kind as to make the chart with 3 bars instead of 2? I then can see what kind of changes need to make for other two and do it myself. 

Thanks again.

I am glad that you have found a solution. 

BTW, by adjusting the attribute [grid.bottom](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#grid.bottom) (or [grid.top](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#grid.top), [grid.left](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#grid.left), [grid.right](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#grid.right)) you can modify the size and position of the cartesian in the whole canvas.
Sounds good, thanks @100pah !

echarts 3.0监听事件简化后，在IE8下捕获不到，比方说点击事件。echarts 2 通过echarts/config的EVENT.CLICK还能捕获到。这个有办法解决吗？
我用的是webpack 1.14和1.13.1版本的

既然要自定义 `tooltip` 的显示隐藏策略，那么可以设置：
`tooltip.triggerOn: 'none'`，然后在单机和双击的时候 `dispatchAction` 来显示和隐藏 tooltip.
